name: Fractal Design North Case
image_prompt: Fractal Design North PC case, charcoal black with walnut wood front panel, mesh ventilation, minimalist Scandinavian design
description: Stunning mid-tower ATX case with real walnut wood front panel and excellent airflow. Features tool-free installation, integrated PWM fan hub, and supports up to 360mm radiators.

reviews.review_text: Finally a case that looks good in my home office. Wood panel is gorgeous.
Airflow is exceptional. GPU stays cool even under load.
Great case but cable management could be better.
